Change-Id: Ib532731898b786a7421225b2d2fd78bc43341afc

Fix bridging setup on node deployment

We can have periodical issue with setting
sysctl-net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables parameter to 0,
because path in proc (/proc/sys/net/bridge) doesn't exists.

"The generic bridging code does not create any file in the /proc
filesystem. The firewall bridging extension, however, creates a
few files in /proc/sys/net/bridge/ that can be used to make core
routines in net/bridge/br_netfilter.c return without processing
the buffer they receive as input.
These files are created by br_netfilter_init, which is called by
br_init when the bridging code gets initialized
(see net/bridge/br_netfilter.c)."[1]

1. Understanding Linux Network Internals by Christian Benvenuti

Implement web-sharing node for publishing jenkins jobs' logs

1) Node is used for storing/publishing jobs' artifacts from internal
infrastructure to external world. Such node will allow to share
logs from internal jenkins. Node simply implements:
  fuel_project::common
  fuel_project::nginx
  fuel_project::apps::web_share

2) sftp user is only able to run sftp command

3) Expected that the logs will be pushed to node using jenkins plugin:
  https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Publish+Over+SSH+Plugin

4) Web-root structure should be implemented on jenkins side:
  web_root/${JOB_NAME}/${BUILD_NUMBER}/

Reuse /var/run/lock dir for placing .lock files

The /var/run (/run) is tmpfs type, so after OS reboot all its
content is flushed, thus dirs like /var/run/npm wont survive
becuase they are not "daemonized". Lets move pypi/npm "lock" files
into /var/run/lock dir, which has 777 chmods.

Change-Id: Iee81852125462115cf22ff1a271ca79cb57a7526

Set Gerrit trigger configuration via jenkins_cli.

Gerrit trigger configuration added to the Jenkins installation
process. It allows to include or not gerrit trigger configurations
during the jenkins installation. To include gerrit configuration
need to set gerrit_enabled variable to true in hiera jenkins_master
role and specify other configuration gerrit_server_name,
gerrit_hostname, gerrit_url, gerrit_username and gerrit_key_path.
Leave blank or comment gerrit_enabled variable to skip gerrit
configuration during the Jenkins installation.

Use libvirt 1.2.12 on RHEL bases distros

Since we plan to use libvirt 1.2.12 on all related distros
(Ubuntu,RHEL), its required to use versionlocking to pin
to specific pkg version.

Also remove the FIXME tmp code as the custom rule for polkit is
provided by the libvirt-daemon 1.2.12 package.

Add jenkins user to the kvm group as kvm group is allowed in the
polkit's rule, which comes from libvirt-daemon v1.2.12.
